Uses of Class
utilities.SpotifyAPIInvalidURLException

Packages that use SpotifyAPIInvalidURLException
Package
Description
api
 

  • Uses of SpotifyAPIInvalidURLException in api

    Methods in api that throw SpotifyAPIInvalidURLException
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    SpotifyAPI.authenticate()
    This method handles the first part of the authentication process for being able to query Spotify's API.
    private static String
    SpotifyAPI.downloadArt(String coverLink, String artist, String name)
    Returns the path of the location of the .jpg file that is downloaded by this method.
    private static String
    SpotifyAPI.downloadAudio(String prevLink, String artist, String name)
    Returns the path of the location of the .wav file that is downloaded by this method.
    private static String
    SpotifyAPI.getGenre(String artist)
    Returns a String representing the genre from the given artist which we send to get a URL to search just the artist, which is a slightly different call to the API than getMetadata but very similar.
    static Song
    SpotifyAPI.getMetadata(String artist, String songName)
    getMetadata queries Spotify's API to search for a track based on the artist and song name.
    static void
    SpotifyAPI.getToken()
    This method handles the second step of the authentication process, which is receiving our token, to be able to query the API for JSON metadata.
    private static String
    SpotifyAPI.parseGenre(String link)
    This method works very similarly to getMetadata but this query specifically queries an Artist and then only grabs the genre that artist is apart of and returns that String.
